thread.title: South Burlington gets ready for big birthday bash
thread.title_full: South Burlington gets ready for big birthday bash - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: South Burlington gets ready for big birthday bash
text:
SOUTH BURLINGTON, Vt. - South Burlington is celebrating a big birthday this week.
 The city is turning 150 years old!
 The city and the local rotary have teamed up to organize a big party to mark the occasion.
 In addition to the fun, there will be a history display set up with photos from the city's past.
 And organizers told us people will get a chance to create some new history!
 "We actually found there's a couple time capsules buried here in the city. There's one at JC Park, there's one at the mall and then there's one they did at the bicentennial of Vermont," says South Burlington City Clerk Donna Kinville. "So we're going to be opening all 3 of those time capsules at the City Fest. Then we are going to be creating our new time capsule to be put away."
 The CityFest celebration is this coming Saturday, August 15, at Veterans Memorial Park. The fun starts at 9 a.m. and goes on through the day until the fireworks at 9:30 p.m.!
